body_html:
LGTM

  • bazel build of pip-package (wheel) for Python-3.6 works fine on archlinux
  • the created Python-3.6 wheel installs and works fine on archlinux
  • verified that Python-2.7 wheel with changed dependency in METADATA file (backports.weakref >= 1.0rc1 instead of backports.weakref == 1.0rc1) finds and downloads the backports.weakref package just fine on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS
body_text:
LGTM

bazel build of pip-package (wheel) for Python-3.6 works fine on archlinux
the created Python-3.6 wheel installs and works fine on archlinux
verified that Python-2.7 wheel with changed dependency in METADATA file (backports.weakref >= 1.0rc1 instead of backports.weakref == 1.0rc1) finds and downloads the backports.weakref package just fine on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS
body:
LGTM

* bazel build of pip-package (wheel) for Python-3.6 works fine on archlinux
* the created Python-3.6 wheel installs and works fine on archlinux
* verified that Python-2.7 wheel with changed dependency in METADATA file (`backports.weakref >= 1.0rc1` instead of `backports.weakref == 1.0rc1`) finds and downloads the backports.weakref package just fine on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS
